attributes.action: Raise VAT threshold to £150,000 turnover for small business
attributes.additional_details:
If the threshold for a small business to become liable to charge VAT was raised to £150,000 many doors would open.
 Small business would become attractive again as prices would be cheaper.By removing 20% VAT from VAT inclusive prices and maybe making a small price increase of 10% on their basic prices small business overheads become more affordable producing more profit. More profit means growth, growth means employment. Job done!
